oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: The New Digital Bleek and Lloyd Archive
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Dia!kwain (David Hoesar) (V)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: |khui- |a is out hunting and shoots a mother baboon who is carrying a child. The father baboon goes to find the child and asks |khui- |a to leave it alone and not kill it, as he has already taken the baby's mother from him. |khui- |a is frightened and picks up his things and leaves them alone. 1) This story is found in Book V-23.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The adventure of |khui- |a with a family of baboons
